svg.text: Sustainable Fashion Co. - Strategic Initiatives Priority Matrix

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: High impact for brand building; leverages existing resources

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Test customer response using existing design process

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Careful vetting; leverages existing marketing budget

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Addresses critical gap; builds customer trust

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Critical for mobile users; enables other initiatives

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: New revenue stream; significant operational changes

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Customer loyalty benefit; requires space and training

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Foundation of sustainability claims; phased approach

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Quality and supply challenges; high environmental impact

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: High impact brand building; content production needed

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Relatively straightforward; better visibility and incentives

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Strategic document; guides data use and builds trust

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Documentation and training; shifts product development

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Ensures customer expectations for quality are met

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Medium impact; compatible with existing processes

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: (No initiatives placed fully in this quadrant)
Rental pilot program sits at the border with Major Projects

svg.text: Numbered in priority order. Each initiative has clear ownership, timeline and next steps.

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Next: Define data points to collect

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Timeline: Begin immediately, strategy doc in 2 weeks

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: Timeline: Dev - 2 months, Full rollout - 4 months

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #444; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 100%;
div.div: • Each owner to prepare implementation brief with milestones, resources, budget, metrics
• Monthly progress reviews at leadership meetings
• Develop phased roadmap for remaining initiatives
